AND or_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')

SELECT * FROM sm_estimate WHERE 1=1 AND NOW() <= DATE_ADD(es_fnl_qut_dte, INTERVAL 1 MONTH) AND es_state = 0
AND es_idx = #{esIdx}

SELECT es_fnl_qut_money AS esFQM, DATE_FORMAT(es_fst_qut_dte, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS es_fst_qut_dte, FORMAT(es_fst_qut_money, 0) AS es_fst_qut_money, DATE_FORMAT(es_fnl_qut_dte, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS es_fnl_qut_dte, FORMAT(es_fnl_qut_money, 0) AS es_fnl_qut_money FROM sm_estimate WHERE es_idx = #{esIdx}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sm_orders ( or_idx, es_idx, or_name, or_dte, or_money, or_mny_unit, or_due_dte, or_due_place, or_bid_price, or_manager, or_note, or_reg_dte, or_reg_mem ) VALUES ( (SELECT CONCAT('OR', LPAD((SELECT (SELECT REGEXP_REPLACE((SELECT IFNULL(MAX(a.or_idx),0) FROM sm_orders a),'[a-z]','')))+1,10,0))), #{esIdx}, #{orName}, #{orDte}, #{orMoney}, #{orMnyUnit}, #{orDueDte}, #{orDuePlace}, #{orBidPrice}, #{orManager}, #{orNote}, NOW(), #{userId} )
mapper.select: SELECT a.or_idx, a.es_idx, b.es_name, a.or_name, a.or_dte, a.or_money, a.or_mny_unit, a.or_due_dte, a.or_due_place, a.or_bid_price, a.or_manager, a.or_note, DATE_FORMAT(a.or_reg_dte, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS or_reg_dte, a.or_reg_mem, DATE_FORMAT(b.es_fst_qut_dte, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS es_fst_qut_dte, b.es_fst_qut_money, DATE_FORMAT(b.es_fnl_qut_dte, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS es_fnl_qut_dte, b.es_fnl_qut_money, a.or_payment FROM sm_orders a JOIN sm_estimate b ON a.es_idx = b.es_idx WHERE or_idx = #{orIdx}
mapper.update: UPDATE sm_orders SET or_name = #{orName}, or_dte = #{orDte}, or_money = #{orMoney}, or_mny_unit = #{orMnyUnit}, or_due_dte = #{orDueDte}, or_due_place = #{orDuePlace}, or_bid_price = #{orBidPrice}, or_manager = #{orManager}, or_note = #{orNote}, or_edt_dte = NOW(), or_edt_mem = #{userId}, or_payment = #{payment} WHERE or_idx = #{orIdx}
